name: Diceyball
description:
If you've had a hankering for a sci-fi themed dice-rolling soccer arcade game, now's the time to satiate your hunger with Diceyball!

Roll the dice into a goal to gain points. If the side you smashed into the goal matches the goal's value, you get a bonus multiplier! Can you get enough points before the timer runs out? (probably, the timer was pretty high for testing purposes)

Controls

ActionMouse & KeyboardGamepadRoll BallW/A/S/D KeysLeft StickDashSpacebarARotate CameraMouse LookRight StickPause GameEscBQuit Game
(While in Pause Menu)QX
